tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crop_health_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT NOT NULL,
    image_url TEXT NOT NULL,
    crop_type TEXT,
    health_status TEXT,
    area_of_concern BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_images (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_id UUID NOT NULL,
    image_url TEXT,
    capture_date DATE,
    crop_type VARCHAR(50),
    health_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE areas_of_concern (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    area_id UUID NOT NULL,
    location POINT,
    area_size DECIMAL,
    concern_level VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE crop_images (
    image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name VARCHAR(50),
    image_url TEXT,
    capture_date TIMESTAMP,
    pixel_resolution FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE crop_fields (
    field_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    field_name VARCHAR(50),
    field_type VARCHAR(20),
    field_size FLOAT,
    location GEOMETRY,
    image_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES crop_images(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE crop_conditions (
    condition_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    field_id UUID,
    health_score FLOAT,
    pest_presence BOOLEAN,
    disease_presence BOOLEAN,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES crop_fields(field_id)
);

CREATE TABLE concern_areas (
    area_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    field_id UUID,
    area_name VARCHAR(50),
    area_type VARCHAR(20),
    issue_description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES crop_fields(field_id)
);
